summary:
Because everyone plays on Master instead of 1:1 making game nearly impossible to balance.
New master value: 0.75 : 2.0
descriptionHtml:
Player damage remains at a static 0.75. XP Gain is also static at 1.0. LeveledActor is at 1.0 for all difficulties except Master which is at 1.25 (same as vanilla)
Master: 0.75 : 2.0
Expert: 0.75 : 1.75
Adept: 0.75 : 1.5
Apprentice: 0.75 : 1.25
Novice: 0.75 : 1.0

Should be much easier to balance now...
author: hideinlight
